snippet: In exchange, the students were offered another gathering space and an invitation to join school leaders to seek a way out of the school’s financial crisis that would not require charging tuition.
abstract: Occupation of office of Cooper Union President Jamshed Bharucha comes to peaceful end; students protesting college's plan to charge undergraduate tuition for first time in a century accept invitation to join alumni, administrators, faculty members and trustees in a joint search for solution to school’s financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: In exchange, the students were offered another gathering space and an invitation to join school leaders to seek a way out of the school’s financial crisis that would not require charging tuition.

headline.main: Protesters Vacate Cooper Union’s Top Office
headline.print_headline: Protesters Vacate Cooper Union’s Top Office

keywords.value: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art
